Requirement.formula: #program; var character = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Character::find('Homer')); if(!isNULL(character)) { var currentJob = Character::getCurrentJobInstance(character); if(isNULL(currentJob)) { return false; } var jobID = Job::getProperty(currentJob, 'ID'); if(jobID == '184162') { return false; } } return true;

Objective.expression: SpellementaryCastleWalls_TotalCrafted + BonzaiBeings_TotalCrafted + FlyingBats_TotalCrafted + MedievalRichHouse_TotalCrafted + SpellementaryCastleGates_TotalCrafted + VampireCasket_TotalCrafted + DarkCarriage_TotalCrafted + SpellementaryCorridors_TotalCrafted + BellTower_TotalCrafted + IronWall_TotalCrafted + GargoyleWall_TotalCrafted + SpellementaryDormitoryTower_TotalCrafted + CoveredBridge_TotalCrafted + WolfRock_TotalCrafted + WerewolfFlanders_TotalCrafted + ForestCave_TotalCrafted + Pyre_TotalCrafted + HangingStreetlamp_TotalCrafted + SpookyBrambles_TotalCrafted + SpellementaryCourtyard_TotalCrafted + MagicalEssenceSucker_TotalCrafted
